actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a new subheading for certain log forwarders used as motor vehicles for the transport of goods for duty-free treatment consistent with other agricultural use log handling equipment.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty-free treatment for certain log forwarders (as well as parts) with cranes, designed for off-highway use, which are used as motor vehicles for the transport of goods.

titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a new subheading for certain log forwarders used as motor vehicles for the transport of goods for duty-free treatment consistent with other agricultural use log handling equipment.
